work.name: IHU Strasbourg - ICube - RDH and IPP Teams
work.summary: Supervision of femtosecond laser texturing process. Laser Surface Texturing (LST) is complex to implement on large, non-planar surfaces. LST supervision is one of the issues addressed by the LABCOM Lasersurf project.

work.name: IHU Strasbourg - ICube - RDH Team
work.summary: Enhancing the value of supervised additive manufacturing of silicone. Distribution of production tools to the ICBMS and LS2N laboratories. Publication of the supervision method.

work.name: IHU Strasbourg - ICube - RDH Team
work.summary: Design and manufacturing of soft robots using supervised additive manufacturing of silicone. Creation of a genetic algorithm accelerated by a deep learning model, and an instrumented additive manufacturing platform.

education.area: Contribution to the design and manufacture of pneumatic soft robots

Sciences, Technology and Health (STS) - Complex Systems Engineering

references.name: Prof. Pierre Renaud
references.reference: Pierre Renaud is a professor at INSA Strasbourg, specializing in robotics and additive manufacturing. He leads projects at the ICube laboratory in Strasbourg. (contact : pierre.renaud@insa-strasbourg.fr)

references.name: Prof. Sylvain Lecler
references.reference: Sylvain Lecler is a professor at INSA Strasbourg and a leading researcher at the ICube laboratory, specializing in laser processes, photonic nanojets, and super-resolution optical sensors. (contact : sylvain.lecler@insa-strasbourg.fr)

references.name: Prof. Christian Duriez
references.reference: Christian Duriez is a Research Director at INRIA (University of Lille), renowned for his work in medical robotics, soft robotics, and surgical simulation. Prof. Duriez is widely recognized for his contributions to interactive simulation and control of deformable objects, bridging robotics and medical applications. (contact : christian.duriez@inria.fr)
